reviewHighlights.text: Extremely unfunny, unoptimized and frankly boring. If you're looking for a meme game, there are much better choices out there. Honestly, don't spend y...
there isn't even a waypoint in the game. you either gotta guess where your next destination is or pray you end up there accidentally.
